intro: Plettkea cryptantha, commonly known as the cryptantha plettkea, is a species of flowering plant in the family Orchidaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, delicate orchid-like flowers that are typically greenish-yellow in color. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Due to its rarity and specific habitat requirements, it is considered a threatened species in its native range.
